column4: so in this community nobody know how to upgrade ubuntu 8.10 to 9.04 through pendrive
Hello Frnds i have very slow internet connections but i download ubuntu 9.04 in usb pendrive n now i doesnot know how to upgrade through pen drive
Hello frnds my bios does not allow 2 boot from pen drive
unless an update will give you the functionality, you will need to add some logic to the boot situation on an internal device to boot the usb
if your board does not support usb booting then you need to work around, its a limitation of your hardware
some bios upgrades may add the functionality but i highly doubt it
